note.previous: Anujjubhūtena haraṃ mahantaṃ, divā ca ratto ca nisīthakāle
Pabhāvatī vaṇṇapalobhito tava, sammūḷharūpo vicarāmi mediniṃ
Samākule sīvathikāya majjhe, pādehi gijjhā parikaḍḍhissanti
Chinnā vane ujjhitā khattiyehi, gayha dhaṅko
Chinnaṃ vane khattiyehī avatthaṃ, siṅgālasaṅghā parikaḍḍhissanti
Yo ve hitānaṃ vacanaṃ, na karoti
Yatthassu bherī nadati, kuñjaro ca nikūjati

note.original: asso hasisati (sī.), asso hasiyati (syā.), asso ca siṃsati (pī.)
yo no dukkhā pamocaye (sī.), so no sabbe vadhissati (pī.)
note.previous: Kuso soḷārapaññāṇo, yo te sabbe vadhissati’’
Kuso ce āgato assa, kiṃ na

note.original: ( ) ayaṃ gāthā sī. pī. potthakesuyeva dissati
( ) ayaṃ gāthā sī. pī. potthakesuyeva dissati

note.previous: Hatthī asse ca yojentu, rathaṃ sannayha sārathi
Maggaṃ no soṇa akkhāhi, yena gacchemu
Kacci ḍaṃsā makasā ca, appameva sarīsapā

note.original: ḍaṃsā ca makasā (sī.), ḍaṃsā ca makasā ca (pī.)

note.previous: Sabbe jeṭṭhassa te bhārā, evaṃ jānāhi bhāradha
Pitupi nando suppiyo, yaṃ nando nappavase

note.original: saṅgahe (dī. ni. 3.273; a. ni. 4.32) tadaṭṭhakathāyo oloketabbā
